title: One Night With My Book Boyfriends
description: Approx 9400 word novelette. Lacy is addicted to her book boyfriends in her erotic stories on her Kindle to fill the void of her lack of a sex life with her husband Phil. Join Lacy on her adventure as she meets her favorite book boyfriends and things heat up and she experiences some mind blowing sexcapades with these sexy men. This novelette is an introduction to characters for upcoming novels.***Contains adult sexual situations and is intended for mature 18+ readers.
author: Bonnie Hardman
